title: Datum Schema
description: JSON schema for a scientific data point

significand.description: In scientific notation the significand (or mantissa) is the part of a number in scientific notation that represents the significant digits

exponent.description: In scientific notation the exponent is the part of a number in scientific notation that represents the magnitude of a numeric value

accuracy.description: An integer that represents the number of significant digits in the numeric value.  This is used specifically state the number of sigfigs as the representation in the significand may have omitted trailing zeros that are still significant.

error.description: The value of the error in the numeric value scaled to the same magnitude (exponent) of the value.

errorType.description: An indication of the type of error the error value reports.

exact.description: Definition of a number as exact (infinite significant figures) or not

unit.description: Unit of measurement of the physical quanitity

unitType.description: The system in which the unit is defined
